subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: If you go by statistics, Alcides Escobar has no business being Kansas City’s leadoff hitter — except that the team wins a lot whenever he’s at the top of the order.
snippet: If you go by statistics, Alcides Escobar has no business being Kansas City’s leadoff hitter — except that the team wins a lot whenever he’s at the top of the order.
